sourcesContent: // WEBPACK FOOTER // // pages/index.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/home/SliderBlock.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/home/ChoiceRoundBtn.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/home/EquipmentBlock.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/home/WhyWeBlock.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/home/RequestBlock.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // layouts/default.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/Footer.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/Header.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/catalog/Breadcrumbs.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/AlgoliaSearch.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/SupHeader.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/catalog/CatalogNavMenu.vue
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // components/catalog/CatalogProductsView.vue

<template>
  <el-row id="price_filter">
    <el-col id="price_title">Цена</el-col>
    <el-col id="price_min">{{ sliderValues[0] }}</el-col>
    <el-col id="price_slider_wrap">
      <el-slider
        id="price_slider"
        v-model="sliderValues" @change="changePriceRange" range
        :step="100" :min="0" :max="$store.getters.productStatistics.maxPrice + 100">
      </el-slider>
    </el-col>
    <el-col id="price_max">{{ sliderValues[1] }} &#8381</el-col>
  </el-row>
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'PriceFilter',
    props: {},
    data() {
      let filter = this.$store.getters.productCommonFilters
      return {
        sliderValues: [
          filter.minPrice,
          filter.maxPrice
            ? filter.maxPrice
            : this.$store.getters.productStatistics.maxPrice
        ],
      }
    },
    methods: {
      async changePriceRange () {
        await this.$store.dispatch('setLastVisible', null)
        await this.$store.dispatch('updateProductCommonFilter', {field: 'minPrice', value: this.sliderValues[0]})
        await this.$store.dispatch('updateProductCommonFilter', {field: 'maxPrice', value: this.sliderValues[1]})
        if (!this.$store.getters.productCommonFilters.category) {
          await this.$store.dispatch('fetchProducts')
        }
      }
    },
    computed: {
      // maxPrice() {
      //   let max = 0
      //   for (let p in this.$store.getters.products) {
      //     if (Number(this.$store.getters.products[p].price) > max) {
      //       max = Number(this.$store.getters.products[p].price)
      //     }
      //   }
      //   return max
      // }
    }
  }
</script>
<style scoped lang="scss">

  #price_filter {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0 10px;
    margin: 10px;
    background: #f5f7fa;
    border: 1px solid #dcdfe6;
    height: 40px;
    border-radius: 4px;
  }

  #price_slider_wrap {
    padding-right: 24px;
    padding-left: 10px;
  }

  #price_title {
    flex: 0 0 80px;
    padding-left: 7px;
    color: #909399;
  }

  #price_max,
  #price_min{
    color: $color-success;
    font-size: 14px;
  }
  #price_min {
    flex: 0 0 20px;
  }
  #price_max {
    flex: 0 0 60px;
  }

  @media only screen and (max-width: $sm-screen) {
  }
</style>

<template>
  <el-row id="price_filter">
    <el-col id="price_title">Цена</el-col>
    <el-col id="price_min">{{ sliderValues[0] }}</el-col>
    <el-col id="price_slider_wrap">
      <el-slider
        id="price_slider"
        v-model="sliderValues" @change="changePriceRange" range
        :step="100" :min="0" :max="$store.getters.productStatistics.maxPrice + 100">
      </el-slider>
    </el-col>
    <el-col id="price_max">{{ sliderValues[1] }} &#8381</el-col>
  </el-row>
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'PriceFilter',
    props: {},
    data() {
      let filter = this.$store.getters.productCommonFilters
      return {
        sliderValues: [
          filter.minPrice,
          filter.maxPrice
            ? filter.maxPrice
            : this.$store.getters.productStatistics.maxPrice
        ],
      }
    },
    methods: {
      async changePriceRange () {
        await this.$store.dispatch('setLastVisible', null)
        await this.$store.dispatch('updateProductCommonFilter', {field: 'minPrice', value: this.sliderValues[0]})
        await this.$store.dispatch('updateProductCommonFilter', {field: 'maxPrice', value: this.sliderValues[1]})
        if (!this.$store.getters.productCommonFilters.category) {
          await this.$store.dispatch('fetchProducts')
        }
      }
    },
    computed: {
      // maxPrice() {
      //   let max = 0
      //   for (let p in this.$store.getters.products) {
      //     if (Number(this.$store.getters.products[p].price) > max) {
      //       max = Number(this.$store.getters.products[p].price)
      //     }
      //   }
      //   return max
      // }
    }
  }
</script>
<style scoped lang="scss">

  #price_filter {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0 10px;
    margin: 10px;
    background: #f5f7fa;
    border: 1px solid #dcdfe6;
    height: 40px;
    border-radius: 4px;
  }

  #price_slider_wrap {
    padding-right: 24px;
    padding-left: 10px;
  }

  #price_title {
    flex: 0 0 80px;
    padding-left: 7px;
    color: #909399;
  }

  #price_max,
  #price_min{
    color: $color-success;
    font-size: 14px;
  }
  #price_min {
    flex: 0 0 20px;
  }
  #price_max {
    flex: 0 0 60px;
  }

  @media only screen and (max-width: $sm-screen) {
  }
</style>

  // services

  // DICTIONARIES
  dictionaries: state => state.dictionaries,

  // SYSTEM
  IS_ADMIN: state => state.IS_ADMIN, // (Boolean) current user is admin?
  ADMINS: state => state.ADMINS, // (Array) list of admin emails
  LOADING: state => state.LOADING, // (Boolean) global loading flag
  ERR: state => state.ERR // (Object) global error object
}



// WEBPACK FOOTER //
// ./store/getters.js
// WEBPACK FOOTER // // ../prod/server/nuxt/components/nuxt-error.vue

<template>
  <nuxt-error v-if="nuxt.err" :error="nuxt.err"></nuxt-error>
  <nuxt-child :key="routerViewKey" v-else></nuxt-child>
</template>

<script>
import Vue from 'vue'
import NuxtChild from './nuxt-child'
import NuxtError from './nuxt-error.vue'
import { compile } from '../utils'

export default {
  name: 'nuxt',
  props: ['nuxtChildKey'],
  beforeCreate () {
    Vue.util.defineReactive(this, 'nuxt', this.$root.$options._nuxt)
  },
  computed: {
    routerViewKey () {
      // If nuxtChildKey prop is given or current route has children
      if (typeof this.nuxtChildKey !== 'undefined' || this.$route.matched.length > 1) {
        return this.nuxtChildKey || compile(this.$route.matched[0].path)(this.$route.params)
      }
      return this.$route.fullPath.split('#')[0]
    }
  },
  components: {
    NuxtChild,
    NuxtError
  }
}
</script>
